title: Gesture Utilization Strategies in Collaborative Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practitioner-Focused Program for In-Service Designers and Planners Aiming to Improve Workplace-Centered Language Communication Skills

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three gesture-based idea visualization strategies used in collaborative design processes
Learners observe peers' gesture patterns using video analysis tools and improve collaboration efficiency by over 20%
Learners incorporate collaboration synergy effects from simultaneous gesture and sketching into project deliverables
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
